name: Getcampaignaudiences
description: Retrieves a list of all campaign audiences and their respective configurations.

Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

$ul: **beginDateUtc**: Start date of the campaign audience in UTC format.
**endDateUtc**: End date of the campaign audience in UTC format.
**isActive**: Defines if the campaign audience is active (`true`) or not (`false`).

**isAndOperator**: When `true`, determines that all the `targetConfigurations` need to be valid for the campaign audience to be active. When `false`, determines that if at least one of the `targetConfigurations` is valid, the campaign audience will be active.
**isArchived**: Defines if the campaign audience is archived (`true`) or not (`false`).
**lastModified**: Object with information about the most recent update of the campaign audience.
**dateUtc**: Date of the most recent update in UTC format.
**user**: Email of the user who updated the campaign audience for the latest time.
**targetConfigurations**: Array that contains all target audience that the campaign audience will be valid.
